verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:6
verses.text: After that, he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once; of whom the greater part remain unto this present, but some are fallen asleep.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:7
verses.text: After that, he was seen of James; then of all the apostles.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:8
verses.text: And last of all he was seen of me also, as of one born out of due time.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:9
verses.text: For I am the least of the apostles, that am not meet to be called an apostle, because I persecuted the church of God.
